page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT, WEST KILBRIDE(2)
page.content:
In the{local hotels}you can get a job as a waitress,though you have to be 14 or over.You get paid quite a lot but you have to work quite hard.
There is a {Youth Training Scheme}at the Community Centre which tries to get young people jobs.Most teenagers work with the scheme for six months or so and then end up in long-term unemployment.
Since West Kilbride is a predominantly {middle class community,}most parents insist that their children try to go on to higher education. Subsequently, many people in the village are employed in the professions.
